class baseclass.player.Player(name, health_point, armor, attack, class_type)[source]¶

Base class for playable character define basic interaction.

improve_stats()[source]¶

Stats improvement when level up.

interact()[source]¶

Player interact actions. Player are able to decide which action will take place next turn. List of actions:

  • Attack;

  • Cast skills;

  • Use item;

  • ???

  • …

level_up()[source]¶

Level up if player acquire enough current level experiments.

move()[source]¶

Player move actions. Player are able to move 4 directions: NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST. Each turn player are only move 1 time and advance 1 tile.

TextDungeon tiles¶

class baseclass.tiles.EnemyRoom(x, y, player)[source]¶

This is where player encounter enemy(s).

intro_text()[source]¶

Appear when player enter this tile.

modify_player(player)[source]¶

Show how player interact with object in this tile.

class baseclass.tiles.Path(x, y)[source]¶

This is an empty space with nothing in it.

intro_text()[source]¶

Appear when player enter this tile.

modify_player(player)[source]¶

This place has no action with player.

intro_text()[source]¶

modify_player(player)[source]¶

This room has no action on player.
